BOOSE Application Documentation

Welcome to the official documentation for the BOOSE Interpreter. This site contains everything you need to understand the codebase and how to use the drawing commands.

Documentation Sections

  • API Reference: Explore the classes, methods, and properties used in the project.

Core Components

  • Command Parser: Handles the logic for reading your scripts.
  • Canvas System: The drawing engine for shapes and lines.
  • Logic Handling: Support for While loops, If statements, and Methods.
